xwikidoc.content: {{velocity output="false"}} #macro(generateDisplayEditLink $changesDoc) #if ("$!displayEditLink" == 'true') #set ($xredirect = "$doc.getURL('view')") #set ($hrefAttribute = "$changesDoc.getURL('edit', ""xredirect=$xredirect"")") #set ($displayEditLinkMarkup = "{{html clean='false'}}Edit{{/html}}") #else #set ($displayEditLinkMarkup = '') #end #end #macro(displayScreenshot $changesDoc $useGallery) #set ($screenshotReferences = $changesDoc.getValue('screenshots')) #if ("$!screenshotReferences" == '') #set ($screenshotReferences = "${xcontext.macro.doc.documentReference}@no_image_thumb.png") #end #if ($useGallery) {{gallery width="420px" height="315px"}} #end ## Make sure we have an absolute reference #foreach($screenshotReference in $screenshotReferences.split(',')) #set ($screenshotReference = $screenshotReference.trim()) #if (!$screenshotReference.contains('@')) ## HACK: fix me #set ($screenshotReference = "${changesDoc.documentReference}@$screenshotReference") #end #if ($useGallery) image:$screenshotReference #else #if ($velocityCount > 1) #end [[image:$screenshotReference||style="border:1px solid silver;"]] #end #end #if ($useGallery) {{/gallery}} #end #end #if ($audience.toLowerCase().contains('user') || $audience.toLowerCase().contains('administrator')) #set ($isUserOrAdmin = true) #else #set ($isUserOrAdmin = false) #end {{/velocity}}
